CustomField.formula: If( AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Type__c, 'Non-Discretionary'), ISPICKVAL(Type__c, 'Discretionary Credit')), TEXT(Is_APPC__c) == 'Yes' ), "ZP02", "Z9")
CustomField.label: SAP Order Type
CustomField.description: ZP02 if IsAPPC flag is set, z9 by default. Checking for both values of type field here to future-proof, in case new values are added.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ZP02 if IsAPPC flag is set, z9 by default. Checking for both values of type field here to future-proof, in case new values are added.
